title: Slayer task/Hill giants

properties.name: description
properties.value: Hill giants can be assigned as a slayer task from Mazchna and Vannaka at level 25 combat. Hill giants can be found many places both above and under ground. They all attack with melee. They always drop big bones and their drop table includes runes, herbs, limpwurt roots and the giant key, which is required to access the hill giant boss Obor. Cyclopes also count as hill giants for tasks.

content:
This article is currently in the middle of an expansion or major revamping.
The information contained within it should not be considered fully accurate and/or complete. You can help by contributing to it.
Hill giants
Requirements
SkillsNone
Combat level 25
OtherNone
Task Amounts
Krystilia100-150
Mazchna40-70
Vannaka60-120
Advanced data
Icon IDNo

Hill giants can be assigned as a slayer task from Mazchna and Vannaka at level 25 combat. Hill giants can be found many places both above and under ground. They all attack with melee. They always drop big bones and their drop table includes runes, herbs, limpwurt roots and the giant key, which is required to access the hill giant boss Obor. Cyclopes also count as hill giants for tasks.

Monster Variants[edit | edit source]

Monster Combat level Slayer XP Locations Notes
Hill Giant 28 35
  • Edgeville Dungeon
  • South of Chasm of Fire
  • South-west of Tree Gnome Stronghold
  • North of the Observatory
  • Gnome Maze
  • Taverley Dungeon
  • Lava Maze
  • Boneyard Hunter area
  • Deep Wilderness Dungeon
  • The standard version of hill giant.
Hill Giant 28 35
  • Desert Plateau
  • Identical to standard hill giants with slightly altered drops.
Hill Giant 28 35
  • Catacombs of Kourend
  • Giants' Den
Cyclops 56 75
  • Warriors' Guild 2nd floor[UK]3rd floor[US]
  • Catacombs of Kourend
  • Ardougne Zoo
  • Cyclopes in the Warriors' Guild requires access to said guild (combined Strength and Attack level of 130 or 99 in one of them). Warrior guild tokens are also required to kill them (10 per minute). Cyclopes killed in the Warriors' Guild has a chance to drop defenders.
  • The Ardougne Zoo cyclops is in an enclosure.
Cyclops 76 100
  • Warriors' Guild 2nd floor[UK]3rd floor[US]
  • Catacombs of Kourend
  • Stronger version of cyclops.
Cyclops 81 110
  • God Wars Dungeon (Bandos' Stronghold)
  • This variety is only found in the God Wars Dungeon. Requires level 70 Strength, a hammer or Dragon warhammer and a rope (first-time) to access. Players may need equipment alligned with Bandos and Zamorak to make other monsters unaggressive.
Cyclops 106 150
  • Warriors' Guild basement
  • Cyclopes in the Warriors' Guild requires access to said guild (combined Strength and Attack level of 130 or 99 in one of them). Warrior guild tokens are also required to kill them (10 per minute). These cyclopes also require you show a rune defender to Lorelai in the basement. These cyclopes may drop a dragon defender.
Obor 106 129
  • Edgeville Dungeon
  • Boss monster. Attacks with both ranged and melee depending on protection prayers. Only available after receiving a Giant key drop from regular Hill giants.
  • For more information see Obor.
Reanimated giant N/A 35
  • Dark Altar
  • Requires 60% Arceuus favour to access Arceuus spellbook. Requires ensouled giant head, 1Soul rune, 3Nature rune, and 4Body rune and level 41 Magic to cast Adept Reanimation. The spell must be cast at the Dark Altar unless it is cast when the ensouled head is received as a drop.

Location Maplink Amount Multicombat Cannonable Safespottable Notes
Lava Maze 4 No Unknown Unknown
  • In the Wilderness.
South of Chasm of Fire 12 No Yes Yes
Gnome Maze 3 No Unknown Unknown
North of the Observatory 6 No Unknown Unknown
South-west of Tree Gnome Stronghold 6 No Yes Yes

  • In the Wilderness.

Taverley Dungeon 5 No Yes Unknown
Deep Wilderness Dungeon 6 No Yes Yes
  • In the Wilderness.
Catacombs of Kourend 13 (Hill Giant), 6 (Cyclops) Yes No Yes
Desert Plateau 8 No Yes Yes
Warriors' Guild 2nd floor[UK]3rd floor[US] 12 No No Unknown
  • Requires access to the Warriors' Guild.
  • Players must attack with melee.
  • 100 Warrior guild tokens are required to enter and 10 are deducted every minute.
Warriors' Guild (basement) 23 No No Unknown
  • Requires access to the Warriors' Guild and showing a rune defender to Lorelai.
  • Players must attack with melee.
  • 100 Warrior guild tokens are required to enter and 10 are deducted every minute.
Ardougne Zoo 1 No Yes Yes
  • In an enclosure.
God Wars Dungeon (Bandos' Stronghold) 13 Yes No Yes
  • Requires level 70 Strength and a hammer or dragon warhammer (and a rope the first time). They and nearby monsters are aggressive unless the player wear Bandos-alligned equipment. Zamorak-alligned equipment will protect from aggressive Zamorakians within Bandos' Stronghold
Giants' Den 8 No Yes Yes

[[Hill giant]]s can be assigned as a [[slayer task]] from [[Mazchna]] and [[Vannaka]] at level 25 [[combat]]. Hill giants can be found many places both above and under ground. They all attack with melee. They always drop [[big bones]] and their drop table includes [[runes]], [[herb]]s, [[limpwurt root]]s and the [[giant key]], which is required to access the hill giant [[boss]] [[Obor]]. [[Cyclopes]] also count as hill giants for tasks.
